channel.title: [PI] how do i make an object give you exp when clicking on it
channel.description:
ive tryed and its InsanityX Package release, as i can't get the dung to give me the exp at the end so i was wondering if there is a way i can add a key to the items u get and if i use on a ladder or portal ( i have id's for both i dont need id's) it gived me dung xp and teles me out of dung. ll help would be fantasict thanks
james

item.title: [PI] how do i make an object give you exp when clicking on it
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

I didn’t bother reading your actual post. I only read the title.

ActionHandler > firstClickObject > in the switch statement

case objectId:
	c.getPA().addSkillXP(amount, skillId);
	break;

I couldn’t understand your actual post, so if you want help I’ll need you to re-write it.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] how do i make an object give you exp when clicking on it
